Question.Subject: Multiple-Package order on Ebay?
Question.Content: If I sell a snowboard and bindings they will need to go in different boxes (but will still be a together type; thing... the board comes with bindings). Do I put the same label on each of the two boxes?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
No, you will need to ship each box separately.
Weigh each box, print the labels accordingly.
You will pay for and print two labels.

Answer.Content:
No, you will need to ship each box separately.

Answer.Reference: Ebay Trust and Safety Board Poster
